Pcie_ep_octeontx License Summary
================================

Pcie_ep_octeontx project contains applications developed by Marvell and other
open source projects to enable using Octeon in endpoint mode.This file gives a
short overview of the various components and pointers to their exact license
information.In the event of a conflict, the license header of a specific file
takes precedence over this file. This is just a summary file.

Pcie_ep_octeontx components
===========================

Component:      target-apps
License:        BSD-3-Clause (SPDX-License-Identifier: BSD-3-Clause)
License Text:   https://spdx.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause.html#licenseText
Project URL:    N/A
Directories:    target/apps

Component:      target-libs
License:        BSD-3-Clause (SPDX-License-Identifier: BSD-3-Clause)
License Text:   https://spdx.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause.html#licenseText
Project URL:    N/A
Directories:    target/libs/octep_cp_lib
